Text:
I stupidly didn't notice the [Lektor PL] part before downloading. :)

Bewarned: There's an audio voice description in Polish for the visually impaired throughout the movie.  If you're English-speaking, it makes it unwatchable.
Memo to self: read the comments before downloading.
I'm definitely agree with MikoNeko. Why I didn't notice about that!! This is really waste my time.
